Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • e.facade.CompanyFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CompanyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      CTOR

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method receives a Coupon object, checks the DB to see if that name is available and if certain coupon attributes are valid, and if so- creates this new coupon on the DB.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllCompanyCoupons()
      this method is used to retrieve from the DB all the coupons of this company, exception if none exist.
      double getCompanyIncome()
      this method is used to get this company's income from the company_income table.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByPrice(double price)
      this method is used to retrieve from the DB all the coupons up to a certain price of this company, exception if none exist.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByType(CouponType type)
      this method is used to retrieve from the DB all the coupons of certain type of this company, exception if none exist.
      java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsUpToDate(java.sql.Date endDate)
      this method is used to retrieve from the DB all the coupons up to a certain date of this company, exception if none exist.
      Company getCurrentCompany()
      this is a utility method used to retrieve a Copmany object from the DB with all of it's attributes, after a successful login and facade acquisition.
      Coupon getSpecificCoupon(long couponId)
      this method is used to retrieve one Coupon from the DB, that belongs to this company facade.
      void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      this method receives a Coupon object, checks the DB to see if that coupon actually exists.
      void updateCoupon(Coupon newCoupon)
      this method receives a Coupon object, checks to ensure it's updateable attributes are valid, and then updates that coupon on the DB by retrieving the existing coupon, setting's its updatable attributes, and sending it to an update.
